data.message: Lately when I go to comment on certain posts I can't leave a comment and it really makes me angry!! Why is this happening? I can comment on regular posts but if I go to comment on a lularoe post I ca can't!! HELP!

replies.message: Hi Natalie. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received, or for overusing a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2huuw7U. -Kiara
Ok thank you it's just weird it started recently idk I guess I won't comment so much!
